entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in Forillon Park. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
